text.content:
PI ATTORNEYS signing 10+ cases/month:

Most lead vendors don't generate leads. They aggregate them. They buy from the same sources as everyone else, then resell to multiple firms in your market.

That "exclusive" lead you just paid $300 for? Three other attorneys got the same one.

You're not competing on intake speed. You're competing against vendors who sold you the same prospect.

Here's actual exclusivity: We run one campaign per market. One firm. Your cases aren't shared, resold, or recycled. The demand we generate is yours.

~$3,000 average cost per signed case. 87% of partners stay past 90 days.

No retainers. No setup fees. No ad spend required.

Real exclusivity. Not vendor marketing speak.

PROMPT: Near-black (#1A1A1A) background. TOP: "THE VENDOR DIRTY SECRET" in bold white. CENTER: Split comparison. LEFT (red tint, "SHARED LEADS"): Single lead splitting to multiple firm icons, "Multiple firms = 1 lead", red X. RIGHT (blue tint, "EXCLUSIVE LEADS"): Single lead to single firm with checkmark, "One firm = one lead". BOTTOM: Blue glowing box "1 CAMPAIGN = 1 FIRM". DO NOT INCLUDE: rounded corners, warm colors, photos, emojis.

PI ATTORNEYS signing 10+ MVA cases/month:

$3,000 per signed MVA case. That's the average. No surprises. No intake burnout. No wondering which leads will convert.

How it works:
1. We fund the Meta ads targeting MVA victims in your state
2. Our MVA-trained intake team qualifies and closes retainers
3. You receive signed cases ready to litigate

You don't pay for leads. You don't pay for clicks. You don't pay for intake.

You pay for signed retainers.

~$3,000 average. 87% partner retention. No monthly retainer required.

Predictable cost. Predictable cases. Predictable growth.

PROMPT: Near-black (#1A1A1A) background. TOP: "$3,000 PER SIGNED MVA CASE" with $3,000 in large #3399FF glowing text. CENTER: Clean three-step process. STEP 1: "We Fund Ads" with Meta icon. STEP 2: "We Qualify & Close" with intake icon. STEP 3: "You Receive Signed Cases" with gavel in #3399FF. Calculator showing crossed-out "Cost per lead", "Cost per SIGNED CASE: $3,000" with checkmark. DO NOT INCLUDE: rounded corners, warm colors, photos, emojis.

PI ATTORNEYS:

It's not because they don't know. It's because the moment a source becomes public knowledge, it becomes crowded.

Every "best lead vendor" thread on Reddit is a list of sources that stopped working the moment they got popular.

The best acquisition systems aren't found in forums. They're built quietly, operated exclusively, and never shared.

That's what we do:

One campaign per market. One firm. No marketplace. No reselling. The demand we generate is yours‚Äîand only yours.

~$3,000 average cost per signed case. 87% partner retention.

No retainers. No setup fees. No ad spend required.

The best systems aren't crowdsourced.

PROMPT: Near-black (#1A1A1A) background. TOP: "WHY TOP FIRMS NEVER SHARE THEIR SOURCES" with lock icon. CENTER: Social media mockup "Best PI Lead Vendors?" with generic replies. Large "DECOY" stamp in muted blue. Arrow: "Where average firms shop". BELOW: Dark box with #3399FF border "What top firms use: Private systems. One firm per market." Badge: "LIMITED PER MARKET". DO NOT INCLUDE: rounded corners, warm colors, photos, emojis.

PI ATTORNEYS:

They sold you 100 "exclusive" leads at $200 each. That's $20,000.

You signed 5 cases.

$4,000 per signed case. For leads that three other attorneys also received.

Meanwhile, they collected $80,000 from four firms for the same 100 people.

You're not the customer. You're the product.

They don't want you to close cases. They want you to keep buying leads.

We're different. We don't sell leads. We deliver signed retainers.

~$3,000 average cost per signed case. 87% partner retention. You pay for results, not hope.

No retainers. No setup fees. No ad spend required.

Stop being the product. Start being the firm that wins.

PROMPT: Near-black (#1A1A1A) background. TOP: "YOUR LEAD VENDOR HOPES YOU NEVER READ THIS" in aggressive white font. CENTER: Calculator showing vendor math: "100 leads x $200 = $20,000" ‚Üí "5 cases signed" ‚Üí "$4,000 per case" in red. Contrast box: "THEIR TAKE: $80,000 from 4 firms for same leads". Arrow to "YOU'RE THE PRODUCT" stamp. BOTTOM: "Stop being the product." with "~$3K per signed case" in #3399FF. DO NOT INCLUDE: rounded corners, warm colors, photos, emojis.
